mapper.select:
select a.*, (select b.SOLUTIONNAME from bi_transform_sign b where b.guid = a.WIPSOLUTION) WIPSOLUTIONNAME, (select b.SOLUTIONNAME from bi_transform_sign b where b.guid = a.PRESOLUTION) PRESOLUTIONNAME, (select b.SOLUTIONNAME from bi_transform_sign b where b.guid = a.ECPSOLUTION) ECPSOLUTIONNAME, (select b.SOLUTIONNAME from bi_transform_sign b where b.guid = a.RLSSOLUTION) RLSSOLUTIONNAME from BI_TRANSFORM_MANUAL a
and a.TRANSFORMCONFIGGUID=#TRANSFORMCONFIGGUID# and a.isecp=#ISECP# and a.ISRLS=#ISRLS# and a.ISWIP=#ISWIP# and a.ISPRE=#ISPRE# and a.GUID=#GUID#
order by a.createtime
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO BI_TRANSFORM_MANUAL ( guid, transformconfigguid, iswip, wipsolution, ispre, presolution, isecp, ecpsolution, isrls, rlssolution, createtime, createuserguid, updatetime, updateuserguid
) select #GUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #TRANSFORMCONFIGGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ISWIP:VARCHAR:NULL#, #WIPSOLUTION:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ISPRE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #PRESOLUTION:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ISECP:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ECPSOLUTION:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ISRLS:VARCHAR:NULL#, #RLSSOLUTION:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#
mapper.update:
UPDATE BI_TRANSFORM_MANUAL
updatetime=#CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, updateuserguid=#UPDATEUSERGUID#, TRANSFORMCONFIGGUID=#TRANSFORMCONFIGGUID#, ISECP=#ISECP#, ISRLS=#ISRLS#, ISWIP=#ISWIP#, ISPRE=#ISPRE#, WIPSOLUTION=#WIPSOLUTION#, PRESOLUTION=#PRESOLUTION#, ECPSOLUTION=#ECPSOLUTION#, RLSSOLUTION=#RLSSOLUTION#,
WHERE guid = #GUID#
